name: Airhorn Firefighter
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 93: Vacation

Theme: Vacation

Limitation: Indirect Control

The local vacation hotel has caught on fire and you must go and get everyone out of the flaming building using your trusty airhorn. Try not to get the residents burnt!

Controls:

Move / Navigate MenuWASD / Arrow keys
Blow Airhorn
Space barConfirm Menu OptionEnter / Space BarRestart LevelRExit to MenuE
